posts.body:
>>b81d0494-1ea3-4216-a624-1e0962742400
Yeah, it's easy bro, just **stop being a retarded winfag and weebfag.**
Nah, but seriously, even if you get it to work, at least last time I tried (like 1 or 2 years ago) TF's performance on Windows is much lower than on Linux for whatever reason.
And with respect to the chatbot thing, just give up. Despite what the poojeets will tell you, it's actually very hard to make good machine learning models. And for a chatbot you need one, and even then you probably would have to go with a mixed approach, adding hardcoded rules to the system, since even the best seq2seq models only manage to put together mostly incoherent sentences.
Not to mention that a chatbot is not exactly high in the list of things that would be actually useful to humanity.
